backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles with authorization checks and a full application workflow including creation, status management, and admin‑restricted updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two admin UI wording and navigation updates to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for public and admin pages with layout and admin guards.
frontend/src/components/admin/Applicatio: Detailed admin view for a single application with status actions, processing fee controls, and payment method assignment.
Searchable admin table listing all applications and allowing selection for detail view.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReceivingA: Form for creating or editing bank or crypto receiving accounts with parsed and reconstructed account detail fields.
Protects admin-only routes by checking identity and admin status, showing login prompts or redirecting unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic session clearing and retry handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the app with a header, footer, and main content container.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders a simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Displays the site header, navigation links, and conditionally shows admin routes and the login button.
frontend/src/components/status/StatusBad: Maps application status values to labeled UI badges with predefined variants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides admin-focused queries and mutations for applications, processing fees, and receiving accounts.
frontend/src/hooks/useApplications.ts: Offers user-facing queries and mutations for creating applications and fetching status, fees, and payment instructions.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Checks whether the current authenticated user is an admin, caching results to minimize revalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing identity loading, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider and renders App.
Admin interface showing all applications and details, with ability to select and review individual applications.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ReceivingAccoun: Admin page for listing, creating, and editing payment receiving accounts.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Provides a grant application form with validation and submission flow, including displaying the submitted application ID.
frontend/src/pages/NotAuthorized.tsx: Renders an access‑denied message with a link back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/StatusTracker.tsx: Lets users look up a grant application by ID and displays its status, details, and related fee info.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the SBA Grant Administration build, including features, issues, and architectural notes for the public site and admin dashboard.
